recordTypes.name: Sign Permit  - Permanent
recordTypes.description: This permit if for permanent signs only.

recordTypes.name: Fire Special Events
recordTypes.description: This application is used for:  RSCCH Events, Open Burn, and Fireworks/Pyrotechnics

recordTypes.name: Development Review Application
recordTypes.description: The development review application should be used for requests for zoning approval.  Residential, commercial and industrial zoning requests can be process with this application.  Applicants are strongly encouraged to contact a planner prior to submitting an application at 847-923-4420.

recordTypes.name: Business License/Registration Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply for a new Business License or to renew a current Business License. This application should also be selected for any businesses that are state-licensed and need to register with the Village.

recordTypes.name: Express Permit Application - Residential
recordTypes.description: Use this application for the following: Roofing, Siding, Air Conditioner, Furnace, Water Heater, Sewer Repair, Plumbing, and  Miscellaneous Electric.

recordTypes.name: Residential New Construction
recordTypes.description:
This Permit is used for new residential construction : 
Constructing a new single family home, new townhome, new duplex, or new rowhouse unit.

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit  - Temporary
recordTypes.description: This permit is for temporary signs only.

recordTypes.name: Temporary Food Service Application for Special Events
Residential Building Permit
recordTypes.description: This Permit is used for residential alterations, additions, accessory structures, and anything else that does not fall under residential express or residential new construction.

recordTypes.name: Out-of-Town Business License
recordTypes.description: This application is to be used for refuse haulers and food trucks that operate in Schaumburg with offices outside of Schaumburg.

recordTypes.name: Land Development
recordTypes.description: Use this permit application for Commercial/Industrial Development, Single Family Residential Subdivisions, Non-Single Family Residential Development (Townhomes/Condos), Multi Family Residential Development (Apartments), Site & Parking Lot Maintenance and Repair, Single Family Residential Drainage Improvements, Retaining Walls, & Hydrant Repairs.

recordTypes.name: Contractor Registration
recordTypes.description: Use this application to register as a contractor in the Village of the Schaumburg.

recordTypes.name: Rental License Application
recordTypes.description: This application should be used for ASSOCIATION and APARTMENT rental licenses only.

recordTypes.name: Vending / Electric Vehicle Charging Station License Application
Fire Systems Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit type is selected when repairing/replacing fire systems

recordTypes.name: Commercial Building Permit
recordTypes.description: This Permit is used for commercial alterations, additions, accessory structures, and anything else that does not fall under residential express or residential new construction.

recordTypes.name: Commercial New Construction
recordTypes.description: This Permit is used for commercial new construction.

categories.name: Planning and Zoning
categories.content:
This portal is currently live for all development review applications.

categories.name: Special Events & Farmers Market
categories.content:
The portal is currently active for Special Event Permits and corresponding Temporary Food Service Applications for Special Events. 


Applications for the 2025 Farmers Market have closed.
